entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries and a few local snow squalls ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
